label: Antique Maps and Globes
description: Market category for antique maps and globes, including vintage and rare items.
intents: Decorate home or office with antique maps and globes
Find rare or vintage maps and globes

subcategories.label: Antique Maps
subcategories.description: Vintage and rare maps from different regions and time periods.

subcategories.label: Antique Globes
subcategories.description: Vintage and rare globes of different sizes and materials.

subcategories.label: Globe Bars and Cabinets
subcategories.description: Globes that double as bars or cabinets for storing drinks or other items.

subcategories.label: Educational Globes
subcategories.description: Globes designed for educational purposes, including interactive and talking globes.

subcategories.label: Decorative Globes
subcategories.description: Globes designed for decorative purposes, including unique and artistic designs.
